column4: i have only wireless, and i have this other laptop what doesent have wireless, can i put a internet cable between this pc thats connected to internet to the other one and get a connection?
you may need a crossover cable. and instll a dhcp server..
reinstalling firefox will NOT affect user settings.. removeing the users .mozilla dir can. or theres other ways..
